forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Windy with a steady rain, possibly heavy at times in the morning. Winds diminishing late. High 14C. Winds SSE at 40 to 55 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall possibly over 25mm. Localized flooding is expected.
forecastday.fcttext: Windy. A steady rain. The rain may be heavy at times in the morning. High 59F. Winds SSE at 25 to 35 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall possibly over one inch. Localized flooding is expected.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain likely. Thunder possible. Low 13C. Winds S at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 90%.
forecastday.fcttext: A steady rain this evening. Showers continuing overnight. Thunder possible. Low 56F. Winds S at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 90%.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. Thunder possible. High around 15C. Winds SSE at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with showers. Thunder possible. High near 60F. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers in the evening will evolve into a more steady rain overnight. Low 13C. Winds SSE at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers early, becoming a steady rain late. Low 57F. Winds SSE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of rain. High near 15C. Winds SSE at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near 25mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Windy with rain likely. High near 60F. Winds SSE at 20 to 30 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain. Low 11C. Winds SSW at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near 25mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain. Low 53F. Winds SSW at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near an inch.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Light rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers in the afternoon. High 13C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: Light rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers in the afternoon. High 57F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A mostly clear sky. Low near 5C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Clear skies. Low 44F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunny skies. High 14C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Mainly sunny. High 59F. Winds NNW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mainly clear early, then a few clouds later on. Low 6C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Mainly clear early, then a few clouds later on. Low near 45F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunny along with a few clouds. High 16C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Generally sunny despite a few afternoon clouds. High 62F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Clear skies with a few passing clouds. Low 7C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Clear skies with a few passing clouds. Low 47F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few passing clouds, otherwise generally sunny. High 17C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds early, otherwise mostly sunny. High 64F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies. Low 8C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds from time to time. Low 49F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly sunny skies. High 17C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly sunny skies. High 64F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly to mostly cloudy. Low 8C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies during the evening will give way to cloudy skies overnight. Low 49F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy early with partial sunshine expected late. High 17C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy early, then afternoon sunshine. High 63F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few clouds. Low 9C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. Low around 50F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy. High 17C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Intervals of clouds and sunshine. High 63F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy during the evening. A few showers developing late. Low near 10C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 30%.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy during the evening. A few showers developing late. Low 51F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 30%.
